ygData.subject: Re: Maximals

::SnowCat::
She ran out towards the meeting site.  She still couldn't smell 
anything.  The cool breaze blew by her ears and then a horrific 
thought entered her mind. I'm Upwind, they could smell me, she 
thought.  She ran wide and went about half a mile out to the side and 
cirled back up behind them.  She was cloaked, but now, she could 
smell the preds.  She could smell Spears and Prebon, but there were 
other smell that she couldn't make out.  She crept up onto a small 
bluff and waited.  (Unknowingly, she is sitting on a bluff that is 25 
yards away from where Slayer is perched, but she can't smell or see 
Slayer,)  She crouched under the tall grasses and a small bush.  She 
watched and waited for the meeting to take place. 


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Ramulus/Firearm/Proto/Smokescreen/Slayer::
> 
> Ramulus frowns at Lunarpine's question, looking down at the anti-
chip weapon 
> he was carrying. "If they were reprogrammed, you mean?"
> 
> He sighs. "Then this weapon will be useless."
> 
> Ramulus looks up at the sky. Firearm and Proto were flying high 
overhead, 
> cloaked. Smokescreen was scouting ahead on foot, also cloaked. 
Somewhere in 
> the area, Brix, Fliq, and Snow Cat were also making their way to 
the meeting 
> place, hopefully also cloaked. That made 8 bots, all out to rescue 
Striker 
> and Spears.
> 
> "Then we'll need to get them and programm them back to Maximal, I 
guess."
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Cloaked on his cliff, Slayer scans the area, searching for any 
Maximals. 
> Catching a glimpse of Ramulus in the distance, Slayer's face twists 
into an 
> evil smile.
> 
> "They are on their way, Master," he says into his comm-link, 
watching Ramulus 
> carefully.
